name: Blob Genetix
description:
Is it really a game ?

Click on "Generate Children" to... generate children.

Select two of them to become the new parents.

Watch them mutate and evolve.

Try to mix similar genomes, otherwise gene corruption sets in and fewer children will be produced.

- Left click to interact

- Right click to see the genome

- Middle click to mess up the experiment :)

Game made for the Trijam 131 - Genetics in 5 hours

Code : 3h30

Visual : 1h

Sound : 30min
